uls-desc: Timi ŋun yɛn zaŋ tum tuma soya pam ka o tooi pii zuliya ka ni tooi mali ŋa zali
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Zuliya taɣibu zaŋ ti ŋɔ. Yulimi [[Special:GlobalPreferences|global preferences]] a yi yɛn taɣi zuliya yɛltɔɣa nti wikis zaa.
uls-betafeature-label: Zuliya ŋan kpe taba ni zaŋ nyɔɣi taba
uls-betafeature-desc: Wuhimi lahibali ŋmaa zaŋ chaŋ zuliya maa yuya, zuliya shɛŋa ŋan kpatalahi n-ti a.
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Seetimi zuliya shɛli din nyɛ di nyabili maa mini di fɔntinima.
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Taɣimi zuliya soya. Zuliya yɛligu maa pala ŋan yɛn taɣi.
ext-uls-display-settings-ui-language: Zuliya zaŋ yihi palo ni wuhi salo
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-label: Zuliya zaŋ yihi palo ni wuhi salo
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Bɔmi fɔntinima shɛŋa a ni bɔri maa
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Bɔmi fɔntinima shɛŋa din kani ka saɣiti suhuyurilim fɔntinima
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Fɔnti shɛli di ni mali maani ŋun mali tumdi tuma nindɔhi ni
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-content-info: Fɔnti shɛŋa din za n-ti din be bini ni
ext-uls-back-to-display-settings: Nyaaŋa zaŋ yihi polo zaŋ wuhi salo malizali
ext-uls-input-settings-desc: Sabbu din yi zuliya shɛli dabam ni na
ext-uls-input-settings-ime-settings: Din kpɛra wuhibu soli zaŋ ti $1
ext-uls-input-settings-ui-language: Zuliya shɛli bɛ ni mali sabira
ext-uls-ime-help: A ni yɛn niŋ shɛm zaŋ tum tuma
ext-uls-input-enable: Yoomi soli zaŋ ti dinkpɛra tuma niɛma
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Dinkpɛra wuhibu soli nyɛla din bɛni ti zuliya ŋɔ.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: Dinkpɛra tuma niɛma nyɛla din yihi
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: A ni tooi ti dinkpɛra soli tuma niɛma sahakam puuni zuliya malizali ŋɔ sheei
A ni tooi ti dinkpɛra soli tuma niɛma sahakam puuni zuliya malizali ŋɔ sheei din miri zuliya yuya maa.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Zuliyanima zaa ( zaa nyɛla ŋan be piibu maa puuni ka che a mini shɛba ni pii shɛŋa maa)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Zaŋmi [[$1|compact language list]],zaŋ ti zuliya shɛŋa ŋa kpa talahi nti a.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Paaji ŋɔ nyɛla din ka zuliya shɛli ni a ni lihiri bɔri ŋa maa
ext-uls-setlang-error: Di di gbaai mi zani di ni niŋ ka yi maani ŋa tahiri a ni di bɔrili zuliya shɛli ni maa.Gibili: $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: Yaɣa ŋan kpe taba ni bɔri soli ni di wuhi di nindoo $1 ($2)
ext-uls-setlang-heading: Taɣimi di nindoo maa zuliya maa?
ext-uls-empty-state-desc: Zuliya shɛli na kani ti ni ʒiya sahashɛli ŋɔ
ext-uls-empty-state-header-actions-avail: Zuliyanima nabi pahi. Pahimi zaɣ' palli
ext-uls-empty-state-desc-actions-availab: Che ka lahibali maa kpe zuliya bɔbigu ni
